I just wanted to say Hi to David, we had him here last year for what turned
out to be a rather intimate gathering and it was wonderful. I hope we are able

messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to let folks know that I ll be speaking in Florida at the end of the month: Not far enough North!!! Do you think you ll ever make it up to NW
messages.messageBody:
"I just wanted to let folks know that I'll be speaking in Florida at
the end of the month:"

Not far enough North!!! Do you think you'll ever make it up to NW Florida..Pensacola specifically?

Ren

Albert Einstein
